09-12-2024: - No longer requires {{ItemIcon|Item=Healing Rite|Size=20}} Healing Rite
06-13-2024: - Active has been reworked. Now channels for 3 seconds, healing you and the target for up to 25% of Max HP. If you click the ally again during that time, you will pull them to you. Has 40m cast range and 45s cooldown. Can be self cast.
